metadata.name: Schtasks Creation Or Modification With SYSTEM Privileges
metadata.comment: Detects the creation or update of a scheduled task to run with "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" privileges

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /change ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/ru ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nt aut')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' system '))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tn tvinstallrestore')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\teamviewer_.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/create /f /ru system /sc weekly /tn avirasystemspeedupverify /tr ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\avira\\system speedup\\setup\\avira_speedup_setup.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/verify /verysilent /nostart /nodotnet /norestart" /rl highest'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation or update of a scheduled task to run with "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" privileges
